body: The url [`https://pypi.io/packages/source/f/flask/flask-0.11.1.tar.gz`](https://pypi.io/packages/source/f/flask/flask-0.11.1.tar.gz) doesn't seem to be valid anymore.  I don't know how to find the right `pypi.io` urls, but the GitHub releases are the same.
title: py-flask version updates, remote switch
